comments.body: Consider checking if 'MainWindow' is null before assigning it to 'desktop.MainWindow' to avoid potential null reference exceptions.
TargetFramework 'net9.0' is not a valid framework identifier. Please ensure this is a supported framework.
Typo in documentation: remove the extra '>' at the end of the comment line.
Typo in documentation: remove the extra '>' at the end of the comment line.
Typo in documentation: remove the extra '>' at the end of the comment line.

There is a logical error in the while loop condition 'mouseY > y + EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2', which should be 'mouseY > y - EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2' to correctly escape from the logic loop.
The 'Random' instance should be initialized outside of the method to prevent generating repeated sequences on quick successive calls.
